page.title: 13RELIGION IN SALISBURY
page.content: Facts collected by interviewing 250 local people. {Do you go to church? }No 114 Occasionally 45 Sometimes 30 Regularly 27 Every Sunday 24 {Which church do you attend? C.of E.-77 Methodist-22 Evangelical-12 R.C.-13 United Reform-3 Elim-3 Other-4 {Did you/would you marry in church? { }Yes 211 No 39 {Did you/would you baptize your child? Yes 202 No 48 {Do you go to church when on holiday? Yes 32 No 218 {Do you listen to Religious programmes {on Radio or watch them on T.V.? Radio T.V. Radio T.V. No 193 145 Occasionally 26 52 Sometimes 21 39 Regularly 10 14 {Most popular religious programmes Radio - Daily Service T.V. - Songs of Praise / Praise Be
